Body: I have a Lollipop AOSP ROM without any Google related service (Google Play is missing also).To get Google Play working it seems(but I'm not sure) that I need to install:Google Play apkGoogle Services apkGoogle Services FrameworkGoogle Login ServiceI have also read that I have to convert them into system apps. My device is rooted so it should not be too difficult to convert these apps into system apps, but I have no idea of where I could find the updated version of the needed files. I have only found some tutorial for old kindle devices with an older OS.Could someone help me to find updated version of needed files for Lollipop 5.1?Any other solution is welcome.
Title: How to install Google Apps And Services on Lollipop AOSP ROM?

history.Text: I have a Lollipop AOSP ROM without any Google related service, also Google Play is missingTo get a working Google Play working seems(but I'm not sure) that I need to install these apk-Google Play apk-Google Services apk-Google Services Framework-Google Login ServiceAnd I have read that I have to convert these in system apps...my device is rooted so should not be too difficult to convert these app in system apps, but I have no idea of where I could find the updated version of the needed apk... I have only foud some tutorial for old kindle devices with older OS.Could someone help me to find updated version of needed files for Lollipop 5.1?Any other solution is welcome.
How to install Google Apps And Services on Lollipop AOSP ROM

I have a Lollipop AOSP ROM without any Google related service (Google Play is missing also).To get Google Play working it seems(but I'm not sure) that I need to install:- Google Play apk- Google Services apk- Google Services Framework- Google Login ServiceI have also read that I have to convert them into system apps. My device is rooted so it should not be too difficult to convert these apps into system apps, but I have no idea of where I could find the updated version of the needed files. I have only found some tutorial for old kindle devices with an older OS.Could someone help me to find updated version of needed files for Lollipop 5.1?Any other solution is welcome.
